pr_title: Public ImageData class for custom image pull policies

timeline.message:
Making imagedata public so it can be used to create custom image pull
policies. Adding test to ensure it works as expected.

timeline.author: bsideup

timeline.bodyText: empty constructor would work too (will use the "default" image), so that we limit the number of images we use in our test suite
timeline.author: bsideup

timeline.message:
Ensuring we don't do unnecessary pulls and using the default generic
container image for the out of package pull policy test.
